backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining resident management types and comparison helpers, mixing in authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dashboard-related authorization, error handling, and UI behavior changes with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of frontend source files to concise summaries describing their purpose and key behaviors.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Publish-only deployment checklist for Version 89 including pre‑deployment checks, steps, smoke tests, and constraints.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions and global styles for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root element and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor initialization, profile loading, routing, and global UI providers.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Provides a dialog form for adding an ADL record, capturing date, activity, assistance level, and notes, then submitting via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Implements a dialog for recording daily vital signs including temperature, blood pressure, pulse, respiratory rate, oxygen saturation, and optional glucose.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Renders a dialog to log medication administration by selecting an active medication and entering time, administrator, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog form for adding a medication to a resident, collecting dosage, route, administration times, physician, and notes.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Defines a large multi-section dialog for creating a new resident with personal info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, responsible persons, and initial medications.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Provides a dialog form to create a weight entry for a resident and submit it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the Moritz Care Home logo with sizing modes and a text fallback on load failure.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog for editing an existing medication, preloading fields and submitting updated data.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large editable form for updating a resident’s core info, contacts, insurance, and medications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple form for users to enter and save their name, role, and employee ID on first setup.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen showing diagnostics and offering retry and logout actions on startup failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags. Handles AuthClient creation, stored identity loading, and login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, authorization status, and resident-related data through a resilient backend actor. Each hook waits for the actor and triggers backend calls with proper caching keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity with timeout protection and optional admin initialization. Exposes the actor plus loading and error state via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light and dark modes, dialog overrides, and detailed print-specific styling. Ensures consistent theming, layout, and color behavior across UI and print views.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides utilities for wrapping async operations with timeouts and normalizing backend errors, plus helpers to classify non‑fatal and authorization errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs using Vite’s base path, removing duplicate slashes and ensuring consistent path formatting.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Implements date conversion utilities between nanoseconds and human-readable formats, preserving calendar dates without timezone drift and providing age calculation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting App inside React Query and Internet Identity providers with global styling.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page fetching and displaying resident lists with filtering, sorting, and admin actions like discharge and archive.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen providing Internet Identity authentication with a styled UI card.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Resident profile page showing detailed resident data, tabs for records, and dialogs for editing, medications, vitals, and logs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, spacing, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing system architecture, features, issues, and versioned component notes.
